archimate:BusinessRole.name: Controller
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: An Identity Owner that is responsible for control of another Entityâ€”specifically the Private Keys needed to take actions on behalf of that Entity. For example, a Thing Controller has a Controller relationship with a Thing. It is one of three types of identity control relationships described in Appendix C.
